param.name: index
param.span: 与已生成（已实现）的项相关的索引。

span.span: An index that is relative to the generated (realized) items.

param.span: -1 是表示项列表的开头或结尾处虚拟项的特殊值。

span.span: -1 is a special value that refers to a fictitious item at the beginning or the end of the items list.

param.name: offset
param.span: 与已索引项旁未生成（未实现）的项相关的偏移量。

span.span: An offset that is relative to the ungenerated (unrealized) items near the indexed item.

param.span: 偏移量为 0 表示已索引的元素本身；偏移量为 1 表示下一个未生成（未实现）的项；偏移量为 -1 表示前一项。

span.span: An offset of 0 refers to the indexed element itself, an offset of 1 refers to the next ungenerated (unrealized) item, and an offset of -1 refers to the previous item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此结构表示 Windows 运行时 (WinRT) 结构的 .NET 投影 `GeneratorPosition` 。This struct represents the .NET projection of the Windows Runtime (WinRT) `GeneratorPosition` struct. 有关详细信息，请参阅 UWP API 参考中的 [GeneratorPosition](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.controls.primitives.generatorposition) 。For more information, see [GeneratorPosition](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.controls.primitives.generatorposition) in the UWP API reference. 偏移量 **0** 表示索引元素本身，偏移量 **1** 指的是下一个旁未生成 (未实现) 项，偏移量为 **-1** 表示前一项。An offset of **0** refers to the indexed element itself, an offset **1** refers to the next ungenerated (unrealized) item, and an offset of **-1** refers to the previous item.
